title: Integration of Generative AI and Language Education: A Practical Approach via Action Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Proficiency and Foundational Language Education Knowledge
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance language education design capabilities using generative AI within smartphone-centric limited tech environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of generative AI and its potential applications in language education.
Learners can design step-by-step strategies for integrating generative AI into educational activities using the AI-ICE framework.
Learners can identify ethical issues that may arise when using generative AI and propose alternative solutions.

resources: Smartphone, AI Tool Usage Guidelines, AI-ICE Workbook
Generative AI Case Demo Videos, Offline Collaboration Tools (Post-it/Whiteboard)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
